com.jgcomptech.tools.permissions

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgcomptech.tools.events.EventTarget<PermissionEvent>
      • com.jgcomptech.tools.permissions.Permission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Permission
extends EventTarget<PermissionEvent>
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object representing a permission.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • removeChildPermission

        public boolean removeChildPermission(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the specified permission as a child.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the permission to remove
        Returns:
        false if the permission is not a child

      • removeChildPermission

        public boolean removeChildPermission(java.lang.String name,
                                     boolean permanentlyDelete)
        Removes the specified permission as a child.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the permission to remove
        permanentlyDelete - if true also removes the permission from the PermissionsManager
        Returns:
        false if the permission is not a child or if permanentlyDelete is true and is a System Permission
